Articles.Content:
Hey, everyone.

Ever since I joined the forums, I saw comments about rescaling the orange tank and other parts to help build space shuttle-esque crafts.  I have a different viewpoint on using Rockomax tech: the Delta IV.  They're orange.  So is *most* of the delta.  Thumper boosters are *somewhat* proportional to delta+GEM boosters.  The original space shuttle had a white external tank.  These are just my 2 cents.  I'm not out to start a debate on what these parts were meant for, I just thought of this as I was building an experimental rover lifter with a Delta IV booster.  Because this is in the spacecraft exchange, I will have it here available for download.(BTW, this is a WIP)

USR2: carries basic untested science rover

Image of said USR2

Pics?

nevermind
